Title: Vivek Darshan Singh | Personal Webpage
Name: Vivek Darshan Singh
Description: GET @ LTI - Larsen & Toubro Infotech. Recent graduate from NIT Silchar. Passionate about Data Science, Coding and Cosmology.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and explore.
AboutContent: I'm techie by day, sportsman by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already cycling, off to a hike, or studying.
I am passionate about Cosmology and Astrophysics (though, never studied them formally). A big fan of Neil deGrasse Tyson.
I know the importance of working as a team and hence would love to work and travel together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently a Graduate Engineer Trainee and upcoming Software Engineer at LTI - Larsen & Toubro Infotech.
